title: feat: SPICE simulation
description: Adds SPICE simulation functionality that runs in a background web worker, ensuring UI responsiveness and reruns when circuit JSON changes.
body:
The simulation is run in a background web worker to ensure the UI remains responsive
The simulation reruns in the background when the circuit json changes

title: support pill hole & square pad pcb_plated_hole
description: Adds support for rendering rotated pill holes with rectangular pads in PCB designs, enhancing the PCBViewers capabilities.

title: feat: add PCB path props to trace
description: Adds properties for specifying a reference and explicit PCB path for traces via pcbPathRelativeTo and pcbPath.
body:
## Summary
- allow traces to specify a reference and explicit PCB path via `pcbPathRelativeTo` and `pcbPath`

## Testing
- `bun run generate:component-types`
- `bun run generate:readme-docs`
- `bun run format`
- `BUN_UPDATE_SNAPSHOTS=1 bun test tests`

title: Footprint prop autocomplete
description: Adds autocomplete functionality for the footprint prop, allowing editors to suggest common footprints while still permitting custom strings.

title: feat: add plated hole & non-plated hole parsing with full test coverage
description: Adds parsing for plated and non-plated holes in KiCad components, including comprehensive test coverage for the new functionality.

title: update dep
description: Updates the kicad-component-converter dependency from version 0.1.9 to 0.1.10 in package.json

title: fix react-reconciler version issue
description: Updates the version of react-threedrei from 9.121.4 to 10.6.1 in package.json to resolve compatibility issues with react-reconciler.

title: Move core to dev
description: Moves the core library to dev dependencies and updates several package versions in package.json.

title: implement the showSilkscreenPinLabels prop along with the test
description: Adds the showSilkscreenPinLabels prop to control the visibility of silkscreen pin labels in the PinHeader component, along with corresponding tests.

title: feat(trace): add pcbPath manual routing support
description: Adds support for manual routing of traces using pcbPath, allowing traces to be treated as obstacles and skipping autorouting for defined pcbPaths.
body:
## Summary
- route traces with `pcbPath` in new `PcbManualTraceRender` phase so they become obstacles
- skip autorouting for traces that already define a `pcbPath`
- test manual `pcbPath` routing without autorouter and verify no trace errors

## Testing
- `bun test tests/components/primitive-components/trace-with-pcb-path.test.tsx`

https://chatgpt.com/codex/tasks/task_b_6894ed0f61e0832eaec4863836b9b5ab

title: refactor(prompts): avoid no description
description: This PR refactors the prompt generation function to avoid displaying No description provided when there is no description in the pull request. Instead, it conditionally includes the description only if it exists, improving the clarity of the output.

title: refactor(releases): move git metadata from builds to releases
description: Update schema to move branch_name, commit_message, and commit_author from PackageBuild to PackageRelease, update UI components to use release metadata instead of build metadata, fix route paths to use releases instead of release, remove mock package builds data, set default sidebar state to collapsed in preview page, and ask user to connect github repo
body:
- Update schema to move branch_name, commit_message, and commit_author from PackageBuild to PackageRelease
- Update UI components to use release metadata instead of build metadata
- Fix route paths to use "releases" instead of "release"
- Remove mock package builds data
- Set default sidebar state to collapsed in preview page
- Ask user to connect github repo

title: fix: update default description in MobileSidebar to an empty string
description: Updates the default description in the MobileSidebar component to an empty string instead of a predefined text.

title: fix bad property access in transformFilesToTreeData
description: Fixes a bug in the transformFilesToTreeData function by ensuring safe property access to prevent runtime errors when accessing children nodes.

title: longer timeout for reloading due to error
description: Increases the timeout duration for reloading the application from 10 seconds to 3 minutes when an error occurs, allowing for more time to recover from errors before a reload is attempted.

title: refactor(preview): improve build status logic and bare working of preview
description: Refactors the build status logic and modifies the preview component to enhance its functionality and user experience.

title: style(index.css): add scrollbar styling
description: Add custom scrollbar styling for html and body elements to enhance visual appearance.

title: refactor(preview): restructure preview functionality to use release-based URLs
description: Refactors the preview functionality to utilize release-based URLs, adds a new release preview page, and updates routing for preview and build links accordingly.
body:
feat(preview): add new release preview page and loading states
refactor(files): extract file tree transformation logic to separate utility
fix(routing): update all preview and build links to use release-based URLs

title: More handling for package builds not being available
description: Adds handling for cases where package build information is not available, displaying a message to the user instead of failing silently.

title: Support package releases page even if build not found
description: Allows the package releases page to function correctly even when no build is found for a package release, ensuring users can still access release information without errors.

title: Big UI Refactor to fix data model for package releases and package buildws
description: Refactors the UI to replace package builds with releases where relevant, introduces new pages for releases and release details, and updates routing and components accordingly.
body:
- **refactor package builds to releases where relevant**
- **wip**
- **fixing up pages**
- **more refactors to fix data model**
- **wip**
- **wip**
- **more ui refactoring**

title: feat: package build  listing endpoints, schema & integration
description: This pull request introduces new endpoints for listing package builds and retrieving specific package build details. It also includes the necessary schema definitions and integration tests to ensure functionality. The changes are aimed at enhancing the APIs capabilities related to package builds, allowing users to access build information more effectively.

title: Github Repo Selector with refresh button and is searchable
description: Adds a GitHub repository selector component with a refresh button and search functionality, allowing users to refresh their repositories and search through them.

title: feat(pr-previews): add support for PR previews in package settings
description: Add allow_pr_previews field to package schema and update API, pass currentAllowPrPreviews to edit dialog components, update GitHubRepositorySelector to use allowPrPreviews instead of enablePrPreview, include is_pr_preview and github_pr_number in package release mapping
body:
- Add allow_pr_previews field to package schema and update API
- Pass currentAllowPrPreviews to edit dialog components
- Update GitHubRepositorySelector to use allowPrPreviews instead of enablePrPreview
- Include is_pr_preview and github_pr_number in package release mapping

title: feat: refactor connected repos UI and add package linking
description: Replace ConnectedReposCards with ConnectedPackagesList component Add GitHub repo linkingunlinking functionality Improve UI for connected packages with build status and preview Remove unused ConnectedRepoSettings component Update API to handle nullable github_repo_full_name Remove extra settings dialog
body: - Replace ConnectedReposCards with ConnectedPackagesList component - Add GitHub repo linking/unlinking functionality - Improve UI for connected packages with build status and preview - Remove unused ConnectedRepoSettings component - Update API to handle nullable github_repo_full_name - Remove extra settings dialog

title: refactor(runner): simplify default entrypoint setup by removing conditional board wrapping
description: Removes unnecessary conditional wrapping of components in a board, simplifying the default entrypoint setup.
body:
fix #799 

The logic for wrapping components in a board was removed as it was deemed unnecessary. The component is now always rendered directly without conditional wrapping, simplifying the code and reducing complexity.
